title: Artificial Intelligence Summer School - CUNEF Universidad
text:
DATES: 30 June 2025 – 18 July 2025
LOCATION: CUNEF Universidad (PIR 0.5)
TIME: 09 h – 14 h, Monday → Friday
CREDITS: 9 ECTS

title: Artificial Intelligence Summer School - CUNEF Universidad
text:
Objectives

Obtain a global vision of Artificial Intelligence as a widely used technology and discover the challenges and opportunities of its applications. Understand the new way of obtaining, managing and analysing data to generate knowledge and incorporate it into the development of novel intelligent systems.
Reflect, analyse and open the mind to the change in society that we are experiencing to understand its impact on today’s society and find new professions, challenges and opportunities.
Learn to program simple algorithms in Python, to illustrate the foundation of the implementation of intelligent systems using machine learning techniques.
Learn the fundamentals of Generative Artificial Intelligence and the different tools available and their applications in different areas of business.
Learn applications of intelligent systems such as Natural Language Processing and other cutting edge technologies.

title: Artificial Intelligence Summer School - CUNEF Universidad
text:
Methodology
The summer course on artificial intelligence will employ a comprehensive methodology, combining lectures, debates, and hands-on programming sessions. Students will gain theoretical knowledge through expert-led lectures, engage in critical discussions during debates, and apply their learning in practical programming classes. This approach ensures a well-rounded understanding of AI concepts and their real-world applications.

title: Artificial Intelligence Summer School - CUNEF Universidad
text:
